tool_description: Queries multiple carriers simultaneously to get comprehensive status updates and service availability information.

tracking_numbers.description: Array of tracking numbers to check

carrier_codes.description: Corresponding carrier codes for each tracking number

priority_check.description: Whether to prioritize this check for faster response

error_messages: Mismatched arrays: tracking_numbers and carrier_codes arrays must have the same length.
Too many requests: Maximum 50 tracking numbers allowed per request.
Invalid carrier codes: One or more carrier codes are not supported.
Rate limit exceeded: Too many requests sent too quickly, please wait before retrying.
usage: Provide arrays of tracking_numbers and corresponding carrier_codes. Set priority_check to true for urgent shipments. The tool returns status information for all requested shipments.

results.description: Status results for each tracking number in the same order as input

carrier_service_status.description: Service availability status for each carrier
